SKILL_NAME: the Dabble Lab Twilio Example Template
WELCOME: Welcome to {}. To start sending messages, you need to save the receivers phone number as a contact. Please tell me a phone number that you would like to save.
WELCOME_REPROMPT: Please tell me a phone number that you would like to save.
WELCOME_BACK: Welcome to {}. Would you like to save a new contact or send a text message?
WELCOME_BACK_REPROMPT: Would you like to save a new contact or send a text message?
PHONE_NUMBER_CONFIRMED: Okay. What is the name of the contact?
Okay. What should I name this contact?
Okay. By what name should I save this contact?
PHONE_NUMBER_CONFIRMED_REPROMPT: What is the name of the contact?
PHONE_NUMBER_UNCONFIRMED: I couldn't understand the phone number. Can you please repeat it?
PHONE_NUMBER_UNCONFIRMED_REPROMPT: Please repeat the phone number that you wish to save.
CONTACT_SAVED: Thanks. I have successfully saved the contact and you can now send messages to it. What would you like to do? Save another contact or send a new message?
CONTACT_SAVED_REPROMPT: Would you like to save another contact or send a new message?
CONTACT_NOT_SAVED: Sorry, I couldn't understand the name. Can you please repeat that?
CONTACT_NOT_SAVED_REPROMPT: Please repeat the name of the contact.
SAVE_NEW_CONTACT: Sure. Please tell me the phone number that you want to save.
SAVE_NEW_CONTACT_REPROMPT: Please tell me the phone number that you want to save.
SEND_TEXT_MESSAGE: Okay. Please tell me the message.
MESSAGE_RECEIVED: Who would you like to send this message to?
MESSAGE_RECEIVED_REPROMPT: Please specify a name from your contact list to send the message.
ERROR_WITH_MESSAGE: Sorry, I couldn't understand the message. Can you please repeat it?
ERROR_WITH_MESSAGE_REPROMPT: Can you please repeat the message?
MESSAGE_SENT: I've successfully sent your message. What would you like to do now?
MESSAGE_SENT_REPROMPT: What would you like to do now?
CONTACT_NOT_FOUND: Sorry, I could not find any contact by that name. Please provide a valid contact name.
CONTACT_NOT_FOUND_REPROMPT: Please provide a valid contact name.
MESSAGE_NOT_SENT: Sorry, there was an error while trying to send the message. Please specify the contact name again to continue.
MESSAGE_NOT_SENT_REPROMPT: Please specify the contact name again to continue.
FALLBACK: Sorry, I didn't understand that. Can you please repeat?
CANCEL_STOP_RESPONSE: Okay. I'll be here if you need me.
ERROR: Sorry, I wasn't able to handle your last request. Could you say that again?
